entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
